post:
Have a look at our revised Offers, Apart from the great prices here are some more
reason to use our service: 

**7 day refund policy. No hassle** 
**Run our own network (ASN 207059), with BGP sessions with some of the most connected providers in Europe (Cogent, EverestDC, etc)** 
**All instances are on 1Gb ports** 
**Dedicates IPv4 and /64 IPv6** 
**All our host Run Intel Xeon E5-2600 v2 CPUs on HP BL460c Gen8 Blades. Some of the most powerful cores on the market.** 
**We accept crypto (Bitcoin,Litecoin,Monero,etc).** 
**OpenVZ instance have TUN/TAP available. No charge to enable it.**  

**So why not try us out today and look out for our Cloud solution coming soon. 
Also have Great offer on Dedicated servers in Cogent DC in London.**
